title: GitHub issues extension
name: github-issues-extension
description: Browser extension that adds handy tweaks for issues at GitHub.
author: Riki Fridrich (https://github.com/fczbkk/)

preferences.title: Hide label changes
preferences.description: Hides all changes in labels associated with the issue. This just clutters the screen, most of the time. What's important is list of current labels associated with the issue.
preferences.name: hideChanges

preferences.title: Hide reassignments
preferences.description: Hides all info about issue being assigned to different person. Most of the time, the important information is to whom is the issue assigned right now.
preferences.name: hideReassignments

preferences.title: Show summary of +1 in sidebar
preferences.description: Will show a count of all +1 comments in the sidebar, along with a list of people who voted.
preferences.name: plusOneShowSummary

preferences.title: Treat "thumbs up" emojis as +1
preferences.description: Some people us "thumbs up" emoji instead of +1. Check this to include these emojis in the +1 summary.
preferences.name: plusOneThumbsUp

preferences.title: Hide +1 comments
preferences.description: If you enabled the +1 summary in the sidebar (see above), there's no reason to display the comments that contain only +1. The comments with +1 and some other content will remain visible.
preferences.name: plusOneHide

preferences.title: Emojis
preferences.description: Some people love emojis. Some people hate them. If you hate them as much as me, here's your chance to get rid of them.
preferences.name: emoji
